hero.tagline: Plug in to Save. Plug in to Earn.
hero.title: Invest in Solar Leasing.
hero.subtitle1: WeShare connects homeowners and businesses seeking affordable solar solutions with investors looking for sustainable financial returns.
hero.subtitle2: Through our Exchange Hub, investors provide lease of cost access while systems — Earning up to 35% ROI while helping communities reduce carbon footprints and energy expenses.
hero.subtitle3: Join WeShare today to break the 8% ROI, sustainability in a green the green revolution together.

features.title: WeShare —
features.subtitle: Power With Purpose
features.description: WeShare is your marketplace for clean efficient — driving clean energy accessibility to a sustainable economy.
features.feature2: Earn measurable returns from solar generation
features.feature3: Empower communities with clean, affordable energy
features.closing: Together we're building a transparent, sustainable, and profitable clean energy ecosystem.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Empowering Communities Through Solar Leasing
mission.description1: At WeShare, our mission is to make clean energy affordable, profitable, and accessible for everyone.
mission.description2: We connect investors and offtakers through solar leasing — turning rooftops into renewable assets that deliver real savings and sustainable returns.
mission.cardTitle2: One Solar Lease at a Time
mission.cardDescription1: At WeShare, we turn clean energy into shared opportunity.
mission.cardDescription2: Through innovation and transparency, we ensure every solar lease delivers not only strong financial returns but also lasting environmental and social impact.
mission.point1: Democratizing access to clean energy investments
mission.point2: Delivering measurable returns with real-world impact
mission.point3: Reducing carbon footprints through solar adoption

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: At WeShare, our vision is to reshape the energy future through solar innovation and shared opportunity — creating a world where every rooftop powers prosperity and every investment drives sustainability.
vision.cardDescription1: At WeShare, we envision a world where every rooftop becomes a source of clean power and shared prosperity.
vision.cardDescription2: Through innovation, collaboration, and conscious investment, we're driving the transition toward a sustainable energy future that benefits both people and the planet.
vision.point1: Democratizing access to clean energy investments
vision.point2: Delivering measurable returns with real-world impact
vision.point3: Reducing carbon footprints through solar adoption

solution.title: Our Solutions
solution.subtitle: Accelerating the Transition to Clean, Shared Energy
solution.description1: At WeShare, we provide an integrated solar leasing platform that connects investors, households, and businesses through real, measurable solar projects.
solution.description2: Our solution makes adopting clean energy simple, transparent, and rewarding — from investment to installation, operation, and long-term returns.
solution.cardTitle: Empowering Growth Through Smart Solar Leasing
solution.cardDescription1: With advanced technology and transparent operations, WeShare turns every solar lease project into a seamless, data-driven investment experience.
solution.cardDescription2: Our platform combines real-time monitoring, financial analytics, and long-term management — ensuring efficiency, impact, and profitability for all stakeholders.
solution.point3: Enabling investors to create measurable, lasting value

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.subtitle: Seamlessly connecting investors and offtakers for a greener tomorrow.

offtaker.step1Point1: Get a WeShare solar system installed with zero upfront investment.
offtaker.step1Point2: Simply pay only for the electricity you use — always cheaper than EVN
offtaker.step2Point1: Enjoy 15-20% lower electricity costs every month.
offtaker.step2Point2: WeShare manages all operations, maintenance, and performance.
offtaker.step3Point1: Track real-time energy generation and money saved in your WeShare mobile app.
offtaker.step3Point2: Experience clean energy with total transparency and zero risk.

investor.step1Point1: Explore trusted projects on WeShare and invest in the one that matches your goals.
investor.step1Point2: Each comes with clear details on performance and reliability.
investor.step2Point1: We take care of installation, operation, and maintenance.
investor.step2Point2: You invest once and enjoy effortless ownership.
investor.step3Point1: Track your earnings and project performance in real time through the WeShare Web App.

marketplace.title: Investment Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Explore available projects
marketplace.description: Join thousands of investors putting their money into verified solar projects. Start small, earn steady returns, and contribute to a greener future.

finance.payoutNumberPrefixInfo: Prefix for payout numbers (e.g., ABC will generate PAYOUT-ABC-001)
finance.title: Finance General
finance.subtitle: Financial general settings
finance.removeTaxNameFromItem: Remove the tax name from item table row
finance.removeTaxNameFromItemInfo: Remove the tax name from item table row [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.excludeCurrencySymbol: Exclude currency symbol from items table Amount
finance.excludeCurrencySymbolInfo: Exclude currency symbol from items table Amount [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.removeZeroDecimals: Remove decimals on numbers/money with zero decimals (2.00 will become 2, 2.25 will stay 2.25)
finance.removeZeroDecimalsInfo: Remove decimals on numbers/money with zero decimals (2.00 will become 2, 2.25 will stay 2.25) [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.outputAmountToWords: Output total amount to words in invoice/estimate/proposal
finance.outputAmountToWordsInfo: Output total amount to words in invoice/estimate/proposal [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.allowStaffViewAssigned: Allow staff members to view invoices where they are assigned to
finance.allowStaffViewAssignedInfo: Allow staff members to view invoices where they are assigned to [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.requireClientLogin: Require client to be logged in to view invoice
finance.requireClientLoginInfo: Require client to be logged in to view invoice [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.deleteOnlyLast: Delete invoice allowed only on last invoice
finance.deleteOnlyLastInfo: Delete invoice allowed only on last invoice [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.decrementOnDeleteInfo: Decrement invoice number on delete [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.excludeDraftFromCustomer: Exclude invoices with draft status from customers area
finance.excludeDraftFromCustomerInfo: Exclude invoices with draft status from customers area [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.showSaleAgentInfo: Show Sale Agent On Invoice [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.showProjectNameInfo: Show Project Name On Invoice [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.showTotalPaidInfo: Show Total Paid On Invoice [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.showCreditsAppliedInfo: Show Credits Applied On Invoice [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.showAmountDueInfo: Show Amount Due On Invoice [Ex: Yes/No]
finance.attachPdfOnReceipt: Attach invoice PDF when sending payment receipt to email
finance.attachPdfOnReceiptInfo: Attach invoice PDF when sending payment receipt to email [Ex: Yes/No]
